title: Krishna profile showing data of other persons with 'Krishna' in name
description: Profile slug 'krishna' (actor Ghattamaneni Krishna) was returning movies where director/writer/producer was 'Krishna Vamsi' or other persons with 'Krishna' in name. Root cause: API uses searchTerm = last word of personName ('krishna') and queries hero, heroine, director, producer, writer â€“ so all persons containing 'Krishna' were matched.

issues.message: Profile slug 'krishna' matched movies where director/writer/producer is 'Krishna Vamsi' (different person). Single-word searchTerm 'krishna' caused over-inclusion.
issues.recommended_action: Exclude movies where the ONLY match is director/writer/producer and the name contains 'Vamsi' (Krishna Vamsi) from actor Krishna profile.

issues.message: No disambiguation rule for 'Krishna' (actor) vs 'Krishna Vamsi' (director) in name-disambiguation.json. Similar to Chiranjeevi vs Chiranjeevi Sarja handling.
issues.recommended_action: Add slug-level exclusion in profile API when slug is 'krishna' and personName is 'Krishna': exclude director/writer/producer-only matches containing 'Vamsi'.

fix_applied.change: Added Krishna (actor) vs Krishna Vamsi (director) exclusion: when slug === 'krishna' and personName === 'Krishna', exclude movies where ONLY director/writer/producer matches and name contains 'vamsi' (hero/heroine not matching).

lessons_for_other_actors: For single-word or common names (e.g. Krishna, Teja, Ram), add slug-level or person-level exclusion rules when a different person shares part of the name (e.g. Krishna Vamsi, Ravi Teja). Use same pattern as Chiranjeevi/Sarja and Krishna/Vamsi.
